name: AiPrise
headline: Global KYC and KYB Platform
description: AiPrise allows fintech companies to integrate with multiple identity vendors through a single platform. Companies like Amal Invest use us to integrate with local vendors and comply with regulations in over 100 countries.
tags: industry:fintech; industry:b2b; industry:identity; industry:compliance; industry:regtech; location:san-francisco-bay-area

Future proof your onboarding
## Scale globally, quickly & reliably
![AiPrise Inetegration](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648b30d5e0080c049208ed4a/64947d9a44819841eb76cddd_Group%2011272%20\(2\).svg)
#### One integration, multiple partners
Connect with local identity vendors through one powerful API, layering up your defenses, coverage and reliability.
![AiPrise Customizable Flow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648b30d5e0080c049208ed4a/64947dac8274ac58ba43be68_Group%2010968%20\(1\).svg)
#### Customizable onboarding flow
Build the right onboarding experience, boosting growth while meeting cross-border compliance requirements.
![AiPrise Decisioning
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648b30d5e0080c049208ed4a/648d5bd4be01f6d67dced817_Group%2010967.svg)
#### Risk based decisioning
Take charge of your fraud engine, curating rules to deter fraud while creating a seamless experience for the legitimate.

Know Your Business (KYB)
## Be in business with verified businesses
#### Global registry information
Validate business information against publicly available legal entity data
#### UBO & stakeholder verification
Go beyond the minimum, verify and screen all officers of the business
#### Social signals
Build a complete risk profile of the business using website, and other social media signals

Know Your Customer (KYC)
## Build trust with trusted users
#### One Click KYC
Unlock the next generation of KYC - using just an ID number and a selfie
#### Global coverage, with local documents
Extend KYC to local ID cards, beyond the traditional DL and passports.
#### Enhanced fraud checks
Use advanced phone number insights, email and device intelligence checks to fight fraud.

## One view to view it all
### Streamline compliance
Empower your team to make quick decisions through a unified dashboard across vendors.
### Monitor and log audit trail
Stay one step ahead of all your regulatory obligations and requirements.
### Generate reports
Easily export & share case data with your technology partners (Banks / BaaS / Fintechs)

## Customers Love AiPrise
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648b30d5e0080c049208ed4a/660c271af9efe3ce055130c5_1.png)
CEO and Founder
AiPrise has been instrumental in the process of building a robust KYB and compliance system for EFEX. They are always at the frontier of innovation to reduce fraud and they are a great partner to scale with.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648b30d5e0080c049208ed4a/660c27648a4f7f3b96539160_2.png)
KYC Analyst
Aiprise is a tool that has helped streamline our KYB (Know Your Business) flow. It features an intuitive interface that makes it easy for us to use and a comprehensive database that eases the KYB workflow, catering to our needs in LATAM, EMEA, and APAC. This ultimately enhances the team’s productivity.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648b30d5e0080c049208ed4a/660c27a42e810d4a66d26874_3.png)
Head of Compliance
Partnering with AiPrise for KYC/KYB flows perfectly into streamlining operations and aiding our expansion in Africa. The customizability of their solutions has enhanced our efficiency and market adaptability, making them an invaluable partner for growth.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648b30d5e0080c049208ed4a/660c27db46fad954620d0120_4.png)
CEO and Founder
Aiprise has streamlined user and corporate verification, ensuring swift processes. As our organization scales, their comprehensive verification system spans multiple locations, and their SDK is remarkably efficient.

generated_description:
**AiPrise: Simplifying Global Compliance** 

Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's S22 batch, AiPrise is an innovative startup that aims to streamline the KYC (Know Your Customer) and KYB (Know Your Business) processes for fintech companies. Located in Santa Clara, CA, the company has a tight-knit team of 14 people and is headed by Group Partner Dalton Caldwell. 

At its core, AiPrise serves as a global platform that allows fintech companies to connect with multiple identity vendors through a single integration point. This is exceptionally useful for businesses like Amal Invest, enabling them to comply with local regulations in over 100 countries. The efficiency gained through AiPrise’s solution helps companies expand globally without the usual hassles associated with compliance and identity verification.

What AiPrise provides is a powerful API that connects businesses to local identity verification vendors, significantly reducing the complexity of onboarding both customers and corporate clients. With over 500 million verifiable businesses and 5 billion verified users across 200 countries, AiPrise covers a vast landscape, making it easier for companies to manage risk while ensuring compliance.

Their service range extensively covers various use cases, from simple identity checks to more complex business verifications. Whether it’s using a selfie and ID number for KYC or validating business registrations globally, AiPrise caters to different operational needs with a focus on customization and flexibility. The platform is designed to integrate fraud protection measures, enhancing the security of risk-based decision-making for businesses.

AiPrise is deepening its impact through partnerships with notable companies (think Comply Advantage and Idology) and aims to help various industries like FinTech, crypto, and marketplaces streamline their compliance processes.

Lastly, the founders and team at AiPrise are committed to pushing the boundaries of what's possible in compliance technology, aiming to set new standards for verification and fraud prevention. If you're looking for a robust partner to simplify your KYC and KYB operations, AiPrise is worth a look.

For more details on their mission and services, visit their [website](https://aiprise.com/).
